summary: Helmet of the Witch-King of Angmar and armor...
descriptionHtml:
True darkness has come to Skyrim!!!Whitch-king of angmar has return!!!

This mod give you crown of the nazgul, and black armor(ebony with black runes).Helmet forget in the section of daedric, armor forget in the section of ebony. There is two versions of helmet, more darker and more lighter. Cleric helmet not work!! If you will dress cleric helmet, you BECOME the Headless Horseman)) Witch-kings crown and black cleric armor(thanks NuLL9 with my textures of runes) looks awesome!!)))
I have all permissions of the creators model and textures))

Sorry for my bad english, i\'m live in Ukraine and don\'t understanding everything))

Who will be interested in playing for the witch-king there a relevant modes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17863 - dark tower (like in the Lord of the Rings)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5727 - weapon collecrion (there you finded sword of the nazgul\'s leader)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14192#content - gives to your sword fire animation like in the movie))
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17036 - Nazgul Race

Instalation
Put the files in your Skyrim data folder and enable in launcher.
 
Credits
Tda - thanks for awesome model of the helmet!!
Virion - thanks for retex of helm!!
DARKFIREGAMING- thanks for idea and help!
NuLL9 - thanks for cleric armor!!
DeadPool - thanks for porting model to Skyrim
And me (LeGioN675) - thanks for new textures, organization and all other works))
author: LeGioN675
